author: iik1997
body:
See discussion in #12544, #12570 and #12620. This update should help to avoid crashes of Castor online DQM in case if recent modifications of Castor/ZDC unpackers in 75X are going to be propagated also to 80X (and 76X).
@popovvp, @cbaus, @vanbesien, @hvanhaev
title: Cleanup and update to stay in sync with modifications done in 75X
